name: Clay & Glaze
story: Our Clay & Glaze studio is dedicated to the art of pottery, where each piece is handcrafted from natural clay and finished with unique, durable glazes. We believe in creating functional art that brings warmth to your home.

recommendedProducts.name: Ceramic Coasters
recommendedProducts.description: Handcrafted ceramic coasters with a unique glaze finish, perfect for protecting your surfaces.

recommendedProducts.name: Pottery Mixing Bowl Set
recommendedProducts.description: A set of durable pottery mixing bowls, ideal for baking and meal prep.

recommendedProducts.name: Sake Cup Set
recommendedProducts.description: A traditional set of hand-thrown sake cups, perfect for enjoying your favorite beverages.

name: Ethereal Glassworks
story: At Ethereal Glassworks, we capture light and color in every piece of blown glass. Our artisans use traditional techniques to create whimsical ornaments and sculptures that look like they belong in a fairytale.

recommendedProducts.name: Glass Tumbler Set
recommendedProducts.description: A set of beautifully crafted glass tumblers, perfect for daily use or special occasions.

recommendedProducts.name: Glass Decanter
recommendedProducts.description: An elegant glass decanter designed to aerate your favorite wines.

recommendedProducts.name: Glass Coasters
recommendedProducts.description: Hand-blown glass coasters that add a touch of color and whimsy to your home decor.

name: Glimmerstone Jewels
story: Glimmerstone Jewels specializes in handmade, beaded jewelry. Our designers draw inspiration from vibrant cultures and the natural world, selecting each bead for its unique shape, color, and story.

recommendedProducts.name: Garnet Pendant
recommendedProducts.description: A stunning garnet pendant set in a delicate silver frame, symbolizing passion and strength.

recommendedProducts.name: Turquoise Ring
recommendedProducts.description: A handcrafted silver ring featuring a vibrant turquoise gemstone, perfect for a pop of color.

recommendedProducts.name: Amethyst Earrings
recommendedProducts.description: Elegant amethyst earrings that capture light and add a touch of royalty to any outfit.

name: Heritage Leathers
story: Heritage Leathers Co. is committed to the timeless craft of leatherwork. We use full-grain leather to create wallets, bags, and accessories that are designed to last a lifetime and develop a beautiful patina over time.

recommendedProducts.name: Leather Passport Holder
recommendedProducts.description: Keep your passport safe and stylish with this handcrafted full-grain leather holder.

recommendedProducts.name: Leather Laptop Sleeve
recommendedProducts.description: A sleek and protective leather sleeve for your laptop, designed for durability and elegance.

recommendedProducts.name: Leather Cord Organizer
recommendedProducts.description: A small but essential accessory to keep your headphones and charging cords organized.

name: Timbercraft Artisans
story: Timbercraft Artisans transforms raw wood into elegant, hand-carved sculptures. Each piece celebrates the natural grain and beauty of the wood, with a focus on intricate detail and organic, flowing forms.

recommendedProducts.name: Wooden Cutting Board
recommendedProducts.description: A robust and beautiful wooden cutting board, ideal for food preparation or serving.

recommendedProducts.name: Wood-turned Salt Cellar
recommendedProducts.description: A classic wood-turned salt cellar to keep your favorite salts close at hand while cooking.

recommendedProducts.name: Hand-carved Whistle
recommendedProducts.description: A small, intricately hand-carved wooden whistle, perfect as a unique gift or collector's item.

name: Wool & Whimsy
story: Wool & Whimsy crafts cozy, hand-knitted accessories. We use only the finest natural wool to create warm, soft pieces that are as beautiful as they are comfortable, perfect for cold weather.

recommendedProducts.name: Wool Headband
recommendedProducts.description: A cozy, hand-knitted wool headband to keep your ears warm in style.

recommendedProducts.name: Felted Slippers
recommendedProducts.description: Soft and warm felted slippers, handcrafted for ultimate comfort at home.

recommendedProducts.name: Knitted Dog Sweater
recommendedProducts.description: A charming knitted sweater to keep your furry friend cozy during cold days.

name: Paper & Ink
story: Paper & Ink is a collective of illustrators and printmakers. We specialize in creating custom stationery, hand-bound journals, and limited-edition prints that celebrate the art of writing and design.

recommendedProducts.name: Handmade Envelopes
recommendedProducts.description: Handmade envelopes crafted with care, perfect for sending personalized letters and cards.

recommendedProducts.name: Calligraphy Set
recommendedProducts.description: A complete calligraphy set for beginners and enthusiasts to master the art of elegant writing.

recommendedProducts.name: Personalized Wax Seal
recommendedProducts.description: Add a touch of vintage elegance to your correspondence with a personalized wax seal.

name: Stitch & Thread
story: The Stitch & Thread workshop focuses on bespoke embroidery and textile art. Every piece is a unique tapestry of intricate patterns and vibrant colors, bringing a touch of personalized elegance to any space.

recommendedProducts.name: Embroidered Wall Hoop
recommendedProducts.description: A decorative embroidered wall hoop, perfect for adding a touch of personalized elegance to any space.

recommendedProducts.name: Quilted Blanket
recommendedProducts.description: A cozy, handmade quilted blanket with intricate patterns, ideal for snuggling up on the sofa.

recommendedProducts.name: Handmade Fabric Coasters
recommendedProducts.description: A set of four handmade fabric coasters, designed to protect your furniture with a touch of style.

name: Wicker & Weave
story: Wicker & Weave creates beautiful, handcrafted furniture and decor from natural fibers. Our artisans use traditional weaving techniques to produce durable and elegant pieces that blend seamlessly with any rustic or modern design.

recommendedProducts.name: Woven Storage Box
recommendedProducts.description: A stylish woven storage box, perfect for decluttering and organizing any room with a natural touch.

recommendedProducts.description: A set of woven rattan coasters that bring a rustic and elegant feel to your tabletops.

recommendedProducts.name: Seagrass Mat
recommendedProducts.description: A hand-woven seagrass mat, ideal for adding a natural, textured element to your living space.

name: Forged Metals
story: Forged Metals is a studio dedicated to the ancient craft of blacksmithing. Our artisans forge unique iron and steel sculptures, tools, and home goods that combine raw strength with refined artistry.

recommendedProducts.name: Hand-forged Fire Poker
recommendedProducts.description: A robust, hand-forged fire poker designed for durability and a classic look by the fireplace.

recommendedProducts.description: An artistic and practical forged metal bottle rack, perfect for displaying your favorite wines.

name: Canvas & Brush
story: Canvas & Brush is an artist-led studio where every painting tells a story. We specialize in a variety of mediums, from vivid oil paintings to subtle watercolors, capturing landscapes and portraits with deep emotion.

recommendedProducts.name: Sketchbook with Leather Cover
recommendedProducts.description: A high-quality sketchbook with a durable leather cover, perfect for artists on the go.

recommendedProducts.description: A unique, hand-painted custom portrait of your beloved pet, created with care and detail.
